A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is an enjoyable popcorn flick with great action\, incredible special effects\, and some really touching moments. Slow in the middle\, but the last hour is really good. But sadly\, I am still not attached to the new characters like I was with Han\, Luke and Leia. I find Finn annoying and a total waste in Last Jedi and Luke never leaves his rock (boring!). But overall I enjoyed the movie. Glad JJ Abrams is doing the next one!
